extracted_playbook.title: Create Backup Copies of Original Files
extracted_playbook.description: Create backup copies of original files before applying the patch to ensure data integrity and recovery options.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update SolarWinds Web Help Desk to the latest version (12.8.3) to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply the Provided Hotfix
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the provided hotfix to ensure all security vulnerabilities are addressed.
